title: John's Merry Beary Gift Giveaway Is the Gift That Keeps on Giving
text:
SOURCE: John's Incredible Pizza Company October 05, 2015 12:00 ET John's Merry Beary Gift Giveaway Is the Gift That Keeps on Giving 
Contest Gives Guests a Chance to Win Over $1 Million in Prizes This Holiday Season 
RANCHO SANTA MARGARITA, CA --(Marketwired - October 05, 2015) - It's the season of giving and John's Incredible Pizza Company is giving guests a new way to have more fun than ever during the holidays with the Merry Beary Gift Giveaway. Guests will receive a Merry Beary code on their receipt October 5-December 24, 2015 to enter online to see what instant-win prize they won. Prizes range from $500 in Fun World Credits to use on games, rides, and attractions to free buffets. The first prize is $3,000 cash to use on a trip to Las Vegas plus admission passes to John's newest location opening in Las Vegas December 2015. 
"The holidays are a special time at John's so we are thrilled to give back during this season with our Merry Beary Gift Giveaway," said Director of Sales & Marketing, Laura Kroth. "The more guests visit John's, the more chances they have to win some incredible prizes. It's exciting to give guests a chance to win a trip to see our newest and biggest location opening in Las Vegas in December." 
More details about the over $1 million in prizes available to be won and the official rules can be found at www.johnspizza.com/merrybeary . 
ABOUT JOHN'S INCREDIBLE PIZZA COMPANY In September of 1997, founder, John Parlet, opened the very first John's Incredible Pizza Company location in Victorville, California to a crowd of curious guests waiting to experience the food & fun promised inside. Eighteen years later, with 10 locations, the John's footprint has grown to an impressive up to 58,000 square feet with an All You Can Eat Buffet, over 100 of the latest games, rides and attractions. www.johnspizza.com Contact Information
